body_text: Why did the Hunter x Hunter manga go on hiatus? I think the Hunter x Hunter manga has been on hiatus for months now; does anyone know the reason for the hiatus? Is the author planning to continue the series?

Why wasn't Hunter x Hunter chapter 350 released yet? Does anyone here know why Hunter x Hunter chapter 350 has not been released yet?
When is it coming out? I would be grateful for any answers or comments you are able to provide.
